Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: 'Deep in the Mine'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: "The giant's body crashes to the ground with a thunderous impact, sending a ring of dust billowing into the air."}
{3: 'Bridget staggers forward and attempts to raise her weapon—but fails, having exhausted herself completely.'}
{3: 'As Skych lies on the ground, the madness in his eyes fades away, leaving behind a glimmer of clarity.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Skych', 3: "I've failed... What a disgrace to my duty...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Skych', 3: "No... Perhaps I had already failed in my duty long before that, when I failed to see through Kurono's schemes while serving as Norman's butler.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Skych', 3: 'I just wanted... to wipe away... the dust covering... the family crest...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clang—'}
{3: "Bridget swallows hard and makes her way to Skych's side, using her weapon for support as she gradually regains her strength."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Sweeping things under the carpet... doesn't make the world clean... huff... huff...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hiding things doesn't help with anything... huff... Things only get better when you put in the effort to make them better. Trying to sweep things under the carpet... is pointless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Perhaps your actions—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Drawing out her words, Bridget makes another attempt and raises her weapon.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '—are in line with your professional ethics. But, before you were a butler, you were human—a victim of what happened here. But, before you were a butler, you were human—a victim of what happened here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Going from victim to perpetrator is not the answer. If you truly regret failing in your duty, then please, stop letting your conscience slide further down this slope.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Skych shifts his head ever so slightly and casts a glance at Bridget with the faintest hint of a chuckle. Then, his gaze drifts off into nothingness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Skych', 3: "Go ahead, Bridget. You're right... Perhaps I've just been piling one mistake on top of another.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Skych', 3: "I could blame it on my chaotic M.I.N.D. after the modifications, but I know better. If it weren't for that sick obsession, I wouldn't have become what I am today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Skych', 3: '...Take them with you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lets out one final, long sigh, and then falls silent.'}
